participant_1.background:
I've been learning to cope with my OCD better and it's been helping me to live a more fulfilling life.
I want to learn how to use my George Foreman grill to make delicious meals.
I like to read fairytales on the weekends because they are a great escape from the stresses of everyday life.
I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I have never been to a fortune teller, as I believe that my future is in my own hands.

i hope to save enough money for it.

content.text: How do you like to spend your free time?
I like to bake cupcakes and watch wrestling. How about you?
I like to read fairytales and cook. I've been learning to cook better with my George Foreman grill.
Oh, that's cool! I've never been much of a cook, but my baking skills are pretty good.
I'm really trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
That's tough. I've been there. I have a couple kids myself. What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse. It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
Oh, that's awesome! I've always thought about being a teacher, but I'm not sure I have the patience for it.
It can be tough, but it's also really rewarding. I love seeing my students learn and grow.
That's great! It sounds like you're really happy with your job.
Yeah, I am. I love what I do.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that
